style.css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("sfw.org.ua"), domain("sfw.so") {
   div[id="loading-layer"],
   td[class*="-for-hueta"],
   table[class="ws_main"],
   div[id="main_left"],
   div[class="chat"],
   form[id="chat-form"],
   div[class^="left_block"],
   div[id="vote-layer"],
   noindex,
   *[class^="addthis"],
   div[class="same_news"],
   div[id^="comment-id"],
   div[id="head_2"],
   div[id="head_3"],
   div[id="head_3_"]
      { display: none !important; }
}
